entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow in the evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
